Sentencas: A novel ceramic system was prepared by adding Bi2O3 to gadolinia-doped ceria (GDC).
Titulo: Direct methane oxidation over a Bi2O3-GDC system

Sentencas: This Bi2O3-GDC system was characterized by temperature-programmed and fixed-temperature reaction of methane in the absence of gas-phase oxygen.
Titulo: Direct methane oxidation over a Bi2O3-GDC system

Sentencas: It was found that adding Bi2O3 to GDC can promote the catalytic activity for direct methane oxidation.
Titulo: Direct methane oxidation over a Bi2O3-GDC system

Sentencas: A Bi2O3 loading of 25 wt% in the Bi2O3-GDC system maximized the activity of direct methane oxidation.
Titulo: Direct methane oxidation over a Bi2O3-GDC system

Sentencas: Possible carbon deposition after the reaction can be negligible.
Titulo: Direct methane oxidation over a Bi2O3-GDC system

Sentencas: In the temperature range of an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), pre-reduction promotes methane oxidation activity.
Titulo: Direct methane oxidation over a Bi2O3-GDC system

Sentencas: At temperatures of about 600 degrees or lower, only CO2 and H2O are produced.
Titulo: Direct methane oxidation over a Bi2O3-GDC system

Sentencas: However, CO and H-2 can be produced only at a temperature of about 700 degrees C or higher.
Titulo: Direct methane oxidation over a Bi2O3-GDC system

Sentencas: This Bi2O3-GDC system can be applied to design SOFC anode materials for complete methane oxidation and thus full electricity generation, without syngas cogeneration, at low temperature.
Titulo: Direct methane oxidation over a Bi2O3-GDC system
